The Team

Ryan Collinsmore_vert
Ryan Collinsclose Roles: Team Leader, Client Liason

I am the team leader and client liaison for this project, this means that I am in charge of overseeing the project and making sure everyone knows what they should be doing and when the deadline for doing this is. I am also responsible for trying to make sure that we can maintain a good relationship with our client and we have all of the questions we have, answered. I am hoping that fulfilling these roles will help to widen the range of skills that I can offer to potential employers in the future, and will also help to produce a good project for ATOS.

Jay Jeyarubanmore_vert
Jay Jeyarubanclose Roles: Deputy-Team Leader, Chief Researcher, Team Website Lead

I am the deputy team leader, chief researcher and team website lead. My duties involve assisting Ryan, our team leader, as well as researching the technologies we will be using for our project and maintaining our team website that is used to present the progress of our work. I expect my responsibilities will allow me to develop my management skills and my ability to coordinate with others.
